file_content.text: [You activate the monitoring station terminal and set it to the Republic frequency.]
[This monitoring station appears to be deactivated.]
Devlin here, I read you. Were you successful? Did you shut the Esh-kha down for good?
The Esh-kha are beaten.
It wasn't easy.
That's a real relief to hear. We'll have a much easier time dealing with the rest of the Esh-kha now that they can't make their getaway.
Agent Moritt is waiting for you. You should report back to him ASAP.
Again--great work. Devlin out.
You people owe me.
That's fantastic news! I'll--wait. Payment? Are you kidding?
If you're expecting credits, you'd better talk it over with Agent Moritt. He'll want to meet with you for a debriefing anyway.
Thank you for handling this for us. Devlin out.
Come in, I repeat, come in. This is Captain Devlin. Do you read me?
I've got urgent intel from Agent Poz, SIS.
She used data we forwarded to pinpoint exactly where the Esh-kha tapped into the teleporter control system. Forwarding the coordinates now.
If you can reach those controls and shut them down, all of the Esh-kha's escape plans will be toast. We can stop them for good, here and now!
I'm on it.
Understood.
Not too complicated, huh?
The plan is easy, but pulling it off might not be.
Let's finish this.
Scans show hordes of those monsters in place to guard the teleporter controls. You're going to have a lot of fighting ahead of you.
I'll keep this frequency open so you can report back when it's done. Good luck. Devlin out.
